publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3023 Murdo Fraser: Perthshire Food Festival-That the Parliament welcomes the Perthshire Food Festival to be launched on Thursday 25 April 2002; congratulates Perth and Kinross Council and Scottish Enterprise Tayside on their continued support of the event which will act as a showcase for fine food and produce from across Perthshire and Scotland, and wishes all those involved a very successful festival. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding*, Mr Brian Monteith*

S1M-3023 Murdo Fraser: Perthshire Food Festival-That the Parliament welcomes the Perthshire Food Festival to be launched on Thursday 25 April 2002; congratulates Perth and Kinross Council and Scottish Enterprise Tayside on their continued support of the event which will act as a showcase for fine food and produce from across Perthshire and Scotland, and wishes all those involved a very successful festival. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding, Mr Brian Monteith
S1M-3023 Perthshire Food Festival (lodged on 23 April 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-3023 Perthshire Food Festival (lodged on 23 April 2002) Nora Radcliffe*, Donald Gorrie*, Alex Johnstone*
S1M-3023 Perthshire Food Festival (lodged on 23 April 2002) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
